Welcome to bet365’s most advanced sports betting app yet! Available on mobile and tablet. Download the betting app today and find out why it’s Never Ordinary at bet365.

Official Global Partner of the UEFA Champions League

Bet on a wide range of Live In Game and pre-match sports including NFL NHL, NBA, CFL, UEFA Champions League and MLB.
bet365 customers can enjoy an unrivalled user experience including:

· Super Boosts: Get our BIGGEST prices on selected markets with Super Boost. 

· Profit Boosts: Increase your profits without increasing your wager with Profit Boosts on Bet Builders and Outright markets for featured sports and events.

· Bet Boosts: Every day we BOOST hundreds of markets on a vast array of Sports. Events with Bet Boosts available will be indicated by two green chevrons.

· Same Game Parlay+: Combine the most popular markets from selected events into one bet. Our user-friendly interface has everything in one place so you can create the bet you want. Available pre-game and Live In Game on a wide range of fantastic sports.

· Live In Game Betting: Bet on tens of thousands of Live In Game markets across a huge range of sports, including NFL and NBA.

· Live Streaming: bet365 streams hundreds of thousands of events worldwide every year, bringing top quality live sporting action straight to your device wherever you are. Featuring events globally from major Soccer leagues, Basketball leagues, NFL & more.

· Match Live: Follow Live In Game events in real time and monitor your bets and stats as the action unfolds. Available on a wide range of fantastic sports. 

· My Alerts: Receive real tailored bet and live sports event alerts straight to your iPhone or iPad.

· Live Golf Tracker: Follow every drive, iron and putt from your favourite players in some of the biggest Golf competitions in the world from the PGA TOUR and DP World Tour.

· Sports Stats: Study and monitor the stats for all major competitions across the globe including Football, Basketball and Hockey.

· Personalised Display: Easily navigate to your preferred sports as our intuitive App will show you the type of sports you bet on. You can also favourite specific sports via the A-Z Sports menu for easy access.

· Sports Betting & News: Keep up to date with the very latest news across a wide range of sports and get extra betting insights from our talent and tipsters.

· Search: Use our search facility to quickly find the sport, team, league or market you want to bet on.

· bet365 Extra: View all of our available offers and promotions, including information on how your sports bets can qualify.

· Choose from a wide range of payment methods including Debit Card, INTERACⓇ and Apple Pay.

· Use your existing bet365 account or sign up via the app.

You must be 19+ and present in Ontario. Gambling Problem? Call 1-866-531-2600 or visit https://www.connexontario.ca/en-ca/.

Tell us what you think, rate our app today!

Please read the bet365 Privacy Policy (see link below) before installing this application. By installing and opening the application you are accepting this policy.

To assist you we offer a range of advice and account options to help manage your gambling. For more information, visit the Responsible Gambling section of our website.
Additional support and advice can be found at www.gamblingtherapy.org."

TeamSnap – the #1 youth sports technology platform – connects the world of youth sports by simplifying team management for parents, coaches, and players everywhere.

Trusted by over 25 million users in 196 countries, TeamSnap helps coaches takes the business out of play, so you can focus on what matters – the game. 
EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE

With best-in-class tools like scheduling, availability, rosters and chat, TeamSnap keeps the  team up-to-date on everything from game times to field locations, no matter the sport.

We’ve also put world-class training for the most popular youth sports, right in the TeamSnap app. That’s 100s of age-appropriate drills, custom practice plans and 1:1 at-home activities, all built with the best in professional sports, so parents, coaches and players know they are getting the best tools to power practice – and play.

FEATURES THAT MAKE THINGS EASY FOR YOU

• Easy Roster Management: Build your team, capture key player data, create lineups, and keep track of player availability, so there are no surprises on game day.

• Built-In Team Communication: One app, every conversation. Message the whole squad or select people — it’s fast and easy, so you instantly get messages to your team, in case of any last-minute changes.

• Effortless Scheduling: Run the season, not the calendar. Get one view for all  practices, games, and automatic calendar syncs.

• Live Updates: Keep teammates, families, and your fan club connected with real-time game updates and post-game insights.

Training from the Pros: Unlock training developed with the pros: FC Barcelona, Major League Soccer, US Youth Soccer, Premier Lacrosse League, Major League Baseball, Jr. NBA / Jr. WNBA and others. Builds skill – and boosts confidence.

TIGHT BUDGET? NO STRESS.

Our free plan includes the core features like team chat and scheduling that power your season.

For bigger teams, and busier team managers, , our Premium or Ultra plans provide extra value – availability, player stats, shared media – at a nominal cost. And they come with a free trial. 

And for those who want the ultimate TeamSnap experience, there’s TeamSnap+ – which provides unlimited access to drills, practice plans, and 1:1 training, as well as limited ads, to streamline the app experience.

EVERY PLAYER, EVERY TEAM, EVERY SPORT

TeamSnap is used by millions of recreational and competitive, youth and adult teams across 100s of sports, from including soccer, baseball, and softball, basketball to pickleball and – yes – cow-tipping, lacrosse, volleyball, ice hockey, and 100s more.

Download TeamSnap and unlock your best season ever!

https://www.teamsnap.com/terms

https://www.teamsnap.com/privacy-policy

Game day’s calling. The gridiron awaits. Get in on the action with DraftKings Sportsbook, your home for LIVE betting all NFL season long. 

DraftKings Sportsbook puts you in the center of every opening drive, hail-Mary and crunch-time play. Download the DraftKings Sportsbook app and bet on your favorite sports all season long, including NFL football, NBA basketball, MLB baseball, NHL hockey, Soccer, PGA Tour Golf, UFC, MMA, Boxing, Motorsports, Esports, LOL, WoW, and College Sports. From moneyline bets and parlays to player props and more, take your shot at winning big with DraftKings Sportsbook.

The action doesn’t stop once the game begins. 

Get your live bet down with DraftKings, the home of Live Betting all season long. Whether the game just started or going down to the wire, you can place live bets as the game unfolds. Between plays or during the break, place a bet in various markets for a shot to bring home some big winnings. Crunch time. Anytime. 

DraftKings Sportsbook is the place to bet touchdowns – and your home for live betting all season long for NFL football, MLB baseball, NBA basketball and beyond. 

• Live Betting & In-Game Odds: Bet on every snap, first down and touchdown with real-time spreads, moneylines, totals and dynamic odds that update as the game evolves. 

• Same-Game Parlays & Combos: Stack your MVPs, touchdown scorers and game totals into a single ticket for greater payout potential.

• Player Props for Every Sport: From NFL quarterbacks to NBA point guards, lock in markets on passing yards, rushing TDs, free throws and more.

Bet with confidence knowing everything is safe and secure. 

We’re currently live & accepting bets in Ontario, Canada. 

Getting started is simple:
1. Create an account.
2. Find the sport or outcome that you want to bet on.
3. Place a bet and follow along to bet live in real-time.

DraftKings. The Crown Is Yours.

–

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.

•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

The NBA App is your home for the season.

Get free, instant access to the latest schedule, scores, highlights, news, and behind the scenes stories from across the National Basketball Association.

In the free NBA App, fans get access to:
- Live scores, stats and standings
- The latest basketball news, highlights, game previews and recaps.
- The full season schedule across national and local broadcast partners.*
- Stories from across the NBA to bring you closer to the action.
- Watch original series that bring you inside the league
- Personalized live updates on your favorite teams and players
- Live free access to postgame press conferences after every game
- Play free games to test your basketball knowledge with NBA Play

* National broadcast partners include ABC, ESPN, NBC, Peacock, and Amazon Prime Video. 

Want even more? Watch live games with NBA League Pass and stream your favorite NBA teams and players.

NBA League Pass subscribers have access to:
- Streaming NBA games live and on-demand.**
- Alternate streams including Data Mode and NBA Hoopervision
- Local language broadcasts
- Overlays with player stats, scores of other games, and live odds without leaving the game
- Mobile optimized game streams for phones and tablets
- Access to stream NBA TV
- Access to the NBA archives to stream the most memorable games and moments.

League Pass Premium subscribers get access to:
- Gametime is anytime with download for later to watch NBA games on the go or offline.
- Commercial free viewing on up to 3 devices
- In-Arena Entertainment at game breaks, so you feel like you are there.

** Blackouts and restrictions apply in the US and Canada.

NBA ID has rewards for every fan. Sign up and get access to:
- Member-only benefits like free ticket giveaways and sports merch deals
- Free live game nights and exclusive content
- Daily fan perks during NBA ID Member Days
- Upgraded fan experiences at NBA events
- Voting on top league moments and influence the game
- Earning badges that show off your fandom

Play free games with NBA play to test your basketball knowledge and show how well you know the sport. Games include:
- Full Court Guess
- Hoop Connect
- NBA IQ
- NBA Rank
- Player Path
- NBA Blast
- Trivia

Get the best free NBA coverage, including pre-season games, global games, NBA Emirates NBA Cup, Christmas Day games, NBA All-Star Weekend and All-Star Game, NBA Playoff games, NBA Finals, NBA Draft, NBA Summer League, and NBA 2K League. The official NBA app features highlights of every shot, dunk, nothing but net, and more from the Atlanta Hawks, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Charlotte Hornets, Chicago Bulls, Cleveland Cavaliers, Dallas Mavericks, Denver Nuggets, Detroit Pistons, Golden State Warriors, Houston Rockets, Indiana Pacers, LA Clippers, Los Angeles Lakers, Memphis Grizzlies, Miami Heat, Milwaukee Bucks, Minnesota Timberwolves, New Orleans Pelicans, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, Orlando Magic, Philadelphia 76ers, Phoenix Suns, Portland Trail Blazers, Sacramento Kings, San Antonio Spurs, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz, and Washington Wizards.

Current NBA League Pass and NBA TV subscribers can access their subscription by logging into the App.

Purchase NBA League Pass or NBA TV, and you will be automatically billed through Apple every 30 days (monthly packages) or every 365 days (annual packages) until you cancel your subscription. Refunds are not available after subscriptions have been activated.

Please visit support.watch.nba.com to contact the support team if you are experiencing any issues.

Download the TSN App and never miss a minute of sports from Canada’s Sports Leader

Live stream over 600+ championship events* on our five national feeds – TSN1, TSN2, TSN3, TSN4, and TSN5 –  and get the latest news, highlights, on-demand games, scores, stats, interviews, podcasts, and analysis from our all-star roster of insiders and experts


WATCH ON THE TSN APP

Coverage of every major league, sport and tournament, including:

Hockey: NHL, PWHL, World Juniors, CHL / Football: NFL, CFL (Grey Cup), NCAA Football, XFL / Basketball: NBA, WNBA, NCAA Basketball, CEBL / Soccer: MLS, NWSL, UEFA Euro, Copa América, EPL, FIFA Men’s & Women’s World Cup / Auto Racing: F1, NASCAR / Curling: Curling Canada / Baseball: MLB / Tennis: ATP, WTA, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open / Golf: PGA, LPGA / Combat Sports: AEW / Rugby: World Cup / Lacrosse: NLL / Studio Shows (SportsCentre, SC With Jay Onrait, and more)

Toronto Raptors / Toronto Maple Leafs / Montreal Canadiens / Ottawa Senators / Winnipeg Jets


HIGHLIGHTS OF THE TSN APP

• TSN+* – Unlock exclusive live and on-demand games, augmented feeds, and award-winning sports documentaries. Exclusive games include PGA Tour Live, AEW Rampage, AEW Collision, NFL RedZone, and more

• LIVE STREAMING* – Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of live sports on TSN1, TSN2, TSN3, TSN4, and TSN5

• ON-DEMAND VIEWING* – Catch up with live sports broadcasts and TSN's popular TV shows at your convenience

• NEWS & ANALYSIS – Get the latest sports news and in-depth analysis from TSN’s best in class team of insiders, analysts and reporters including Darren Dreger, Pierre Lebrun, James Duthie, Jeff O’Neil, Luke Willson, Davis Sanchez, Jack Armstrong, and more

• LIVE SCORES – Stay updated in real-time with live scores from every game

• CUSTOMIZABLE NEWS & SCOREBOARD – Tailor your experience with instant access to news, scores, and stats from your favorite leagues, teams, and players

• ODDS, INSIGHTS & ANALYSIS – Make informed decisions with top industry sports insights powered by FanDuel

• TSN PODCASTS & RADIO – Enjoy direct access to TSN-produced podcasts and live TSN Radio stations in Montreal, Ottawa, and Toronto

*PLEASE NOTE*

• TSN+ is a digital streaming service that is included with a TSN subscription through TSN.ca or the TSN app, and it can also be purchased separately as a standalone subscription

• Live streaming and on-demand viewing require an active TSN subscription, either through an online subscription or through a TV package

• Blackout restrictions may apply for certain content

• Video content is exclusively accessible within Canada

• The app features in-app advertisements, even with a TSN subscription

• In-app subscriptions provide access to TSN during the term of the prepaid subscription period. At the end of that period, the subscription plan will automatically renew according to the selected period and payment will be charged to your credit card account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal can be turned off in your Account Settings after purchase. All cancellations will take effect at the end of the current period. There are no refunds on paid subscription fees. Prices are subject to change.

HOF (Hall of Fame) is the sports stats and analytics app built to help you research every player and game more effectively — using advanced data tools, clean visuals, and flexible filters.

Download today to join 500,000+ HOF users. Your subscription includes unlimited access to our full suite of sports data tools and membership to our active Discord community.

We offer fast, friendly customer service. If you have any questions or want to get in touch, message us on social media, email us, or chat with us via your account page in the app.

––––

LEAGUES COVERED
- NBA
- NFL
- CFB (NCAAF)
- CBB (NCAAB)
- NHL
- MLB
- WNBA
- Champions League
- Premier League
- MLS
- La Liga
- Bundesliga
- Ligue 1
- Serie A

–––––

HOW IT WORKS
HOME
Stay updated with upcoming matchups and stat breakdowns for every game
Explore matchup strengths & weaknesses, key players, injuries, and usage trends

OPTIMIZER
Analyze combinations of player and team stats across single or multiple games
See how often specific combinations have occurred historically
Understand correlation between stats and remove less consistent stats
Send your research directly to other apps in one click

DEEP STATS
Dive into player and team performance data with easy-to-read visuals and supporting data
Look up any player or team to view charts, game logs, and matchup strength data
View stats from players of the same position who recently faced the upcoming opponent
Toggle between different time spans
Apply filters such as Head-to-Head games, Home/Away, With/Without Teammates, Opponent Strength, and more to check performance under specific circumstances

LEADERBOARDS
View consistency rankings for player stats like 1+ TDs for NFL or 25+ points for NBA
Toggle to view leaders over just the last 5 games, last 10 games, or head-to-head games
Check matchup grades and odds for each player/team stat

TRENDS
Browse player projections sorted by value
Use advanced filters to customize your research
Identify outliers based on historical and recent data

–––––

ABOUT US
HOF was started by two lifelong sports fans and Ivy League grads with the goal of making stats-driven sports research more accessible and fun.

We’re obsessed with delivering a world-class experience for fans who love data, trends, and sports stories told through numbers.

Our mission is to help you enjoy the game on a deeper level — whether you’re tracking your favorite player, building a custom analysis, or just digging into stats with friends.

–––––

DISCLAIMER
All data and content in the app are for informational and entertainment purposes only. Nothing provided should be considered financial advice. This platform is intended for adult users.

If you or someone you know needs support for responsible play, call 1-800-426-2537.

HOF is a subscription service which costs $19.99/month or $119.99/year, following a 7-DAY FREE TRIAL.

Payment will be charged to iTunes account upon purchase and auto-renews at the same price unless deactivated in iTunes Account Settings.

Licensed Application End User License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

LiveBarn provides Live and On Demand Streaming of amateur and youth sporting events. LiveBarn streams from over 3,000 playing surfaces across the US & Canada, covering ice hockey, baseball, basketball, volleyball, soccer and lacrosse.

A LiveBarn monthly subscription is required to utilize the LiveBarn App. The LiveBarn App enables subscribers to watch unlimited Live & On Demand broadcasts from any installed location. The Venue Locator makes it easy to search and favorite your most frequently watched venues. Users can share, save and submit unlimited highlights via text, email or social media.  

LiveBarn subscribers can easily navigate between different viewing options, choosing to watch via automated tracking or controlling the screen through the panoramic view. Coaches benefit from being able to use video to improve both individual and team performance. Parents and Grandparents can watch and stay connected to the action from anywhere. All users, including athletes, can quickly share, store and create memories, capturing all of their favorite highlights forever.

LiveBarn also has a dedicated customer support team ready to help users with all of their needs.

The NHL App  dives into the 2025-26 season with a host of exciting new features, including:

– Stats, reimagined. We’ve got League Leaders, no doubt… and a whole lot more. Discover a Stats surface that incorporates EDGE Advanced Stats, Data Visualizations and even some fun facts and new ways of looking at the game. More modules rolling out as the season unfolds.

– Live Activities made its rookie (ok, beta) debut during the playoffs last season; it’s back and now fully-featured. Choose one game, or opt-in for any (or all!) teams so you can set it and forget it!

– How to Watch: There’s more ways than ever to watch a game, and we got you covered with our expanded feature – all the info to know where to stream, tune in or follow along.

– Navigation: We’ve rearranged the furniture a bit to let you jump directly to a Team or Player from our new Search bar, added tab bar-level access to Stats, and the evolution of the latest tab into your Home for all things hockey is underway.  

A refreshed and timely onboarding flow reviews your choices, setting you up to experience all the NHL App has to offer, just the way you like it: breaking news notifications, up-to-the-minute scores and live Gamecenter, new EDGE stats, Game Stories & video highlights, your favorite team’s icon and Goal Horn game alerts & much more. 

By downloading and using the NHL® app, you acknowledge and agree that (i) you have read, understood and agreed to be bound by the NHL.com Terms of Service (https://www.nhl.com/info/terms-of-service) and (ii) the information you provide will be handled in accordance with the NHL.com Privacy Policy (https://www.nhl.com/info/privacy-policy).  

Features and content within the NHL® app are subject to change.

iHunter is Canada's all-in-one hunting app designed for hunters across British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Ontario, Quebec, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and the Yukon Territories. The app is both free to download and free to use.

Regulations are updated annually upon release by the respective provinces.

By overlaying hunting zones onto various base maps, users can easily determine their current location and the corresponding zone. Users can delve deeper into specific zones to view the open seasons for big game, predators, game birds, and small game. Additionally, they can add their own waypoints, tracks, and drawings to keep track of hunting spots, past harvests, and landowner contact information.

Features (Most functional offline):

• View Hunting zones overlaid on your choice of map.
• Multiple satellite, topographic, and road maps included which automatically caching for offline use.
• Add waypoints to the map at your current location, known GPS locations, or by tapping on the map.
• Log in to back up and synchronize waypoints and preferences across devices.
• Utilize the sunrise/sunset calculator to determine legal hunting light at your location or a waypoint.
• Share your current location with friends or family via email or text for easy location tracking requires internet.
• Display weather at your current location or a waypoint (requires internet).
• First Nations Reserve boundaries.
• Import waypoints and tracks from GPX, KML, and KMZ files.
• Track your position, speed, and altitude; draw over the map; search the map; view recently viewed and favourited items. (Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can significantly decrease battery life).

For each province, there are two subscription options to enhance the iHunter app:

With an iHunter Core yearly subscription, you will receive:
• Access to select hunting zones to view summaries of big-game, predators, game birds, and small game seasons (works offline).
• Ability to select regions of base maps and map layers to cache for offline use.
• Unlimited waypoints, tracks, and drawings.
• Capability to add your own TMS and WMS map layers.
• Wind condition display by location (requires internet).
• 3D base maps.

With an iHunter Pro yearly subscription, you will receive:
• All features included in the Core Subscription.
• CarPlay integration.
• iHunter layers in driving navigation for both CarPlay and in-app navigation.
• Additional public and private land layers. The available layers differ for each province. See https://www.ihunterapp.com/ for more information.

For more information, visit: https://www.ihunterapp.com/subscription-terms-of-use/

Other available purchases:
• Land Ownership Maps (AB): Over 60 county land ownership overlays ranging in price from $9.99 to $29.99 are available for Alberta.
• Land Ownership Maps (SK): Over 180 RM land ownership overlays ranging in price from $14.99 to $21.99 are available for Saskatchewan.
• Land Ownership Maps (MB): Over 70 RM land ownership overlays ranging in price from $14.99 to $44.99 are available for Manitoba.
